title: The Wicked + The Divine, Vol. 8: Old Is the New New
description: Modernist poets trapped in an Agatha Christie Murder Mystery. The Romantics gathering in Lake Geneva to resurrect the dead. What really happened during the fall of Rome. The Lucifer who was a nun, hearing Ananke's Black Death confession. As we approach the end, we start to see the full picture. Also includes the delights of the WicDiv Christmas Annual and the Comedy special.Collects all six of THE WICKED + THE DIVINE's essential Specials.
author: Kieron Gillen
